comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: John Taylor Adams (December 22, 1862 – October 28, 1939) was a noted businessman in the Dubuque, Iowa area and also a former Chairman of the Republican National Committee (1921–1924) en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Taylor_Adams

comment._content: Richard Arthur Norton: Thanks for the additional info. here.  We'll include it next time we update.
